name: Stealthy Toddler
description:
Stealthy Toddler: Your grandparents have taken you PS1 because of a small incident playing with water inside the house.  The house is very old and there isn't much else to do... so you decided to take on the mission of recovering what is yours.

Hide from the adults and create your pathways towards your objective.   Sneak under tables or over furniture, hide in the shadows and obtain the keys to the locks. 

  • Stealth gameplay
  • Low poly graphics
  • Short sit and play experience
  • Stealth gameplay
  • Low poly graphics
  • Short sit and play experience
